mapper.sql: REVIEW_NO , REVIEW_LIKE_TXT , REVIEW_LEARN_TXT , REVIEW_MISS_TXT , SPR_NO , MEM_NO
mapper.select: SELECT A.BLG_NO , A.BLG_NAME , A.BLG_PRI , A.BLG_ENROLL_DATE , B.SPR_END_DATE , A.PJT_NO , A.BLG_DEL_YN , A.BLG_DEMO_MEMO , A.BLG_REF_MEMO FROM BACKLOG A JOIN SPRINT B ON(A.BLG_NO = B.BLG_NO) WHERE A.PJT_NO = #{pjtNo} AND B.SPR_END_DATE < SYSDATE

SELECT D.RNUM , D.BLG_NO , D.BLG_NAME , D.BLG_PRI , D.BLG_ENROLL_DATE , D.SPR_END_DATE , D.SPR_NO , D.PJT_NO , D.BLG_DEL_YN , D.BLG_DEMO_MEMO , D.BLG_REF_MEMO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , C.BLG_NO , C.BLG_NAME , C.BLG_PRI , C.BLG_ENROLL_DATE , C.SPR_END_DATE , C.SPR_NO , C.PJT_NO , C.BLG_DEL_YN , C.BLG_DEMO_MEMO , C.BLG_REF_MEMO FROM (SELECT A.BLG_NO , A.BLG_NAME , A.BLG_PRI , A.BLG_ENROLL_DATE , B.SPR_END_DATE , B.SPR_NO , A.PJT_NO , A.BLG_DEL_YN , A.BLG_DEMO_MEMO , A.BLG_REF_MEMO FROM BACKLOG A JOIN SPRINT B ON(A.BLG_NO = B.BLG_NO) WHERE A.PJT_NO = #{pjtNo} AND B.SPR_END_DATE < SYSDATE ORDER BY B.SPR_END_DATE DESC ) C ) D WHERE D.RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT A.REVIEW_LIKE_TXT , A.REVIEW_LEARN_TXT , A.REVIEW_MISS_TXT , A.REVIEW_NO , A.SPR_NO , A.MEM_NO FROM REVIEW A WHERE A.SPR_NO = #{sprNo} )
SELECT A.PJT_NAME , A.PJT_NO , C.SPR_NAME FROM PROJECT A JOIN BACKLOG B ON(A.PJT_NO = B.PJT_NO) JOIN SPRINT C ON(B.BLG_NO = C.BLG_NO) WHERE B.BLG_NO = #{blgNo}

SELECT A.REVIEW_NO , A.REVIEW_LIKE_TXT , A.REVIEW_LEARN_TXT , A.REVIEW_MISS_TXT , A.SPR_NO , A.MEM_NO , B.MEM_NAME FROM REVIEW A JOIN MEMBER B ON(A.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO) WHERE A.SPR_NO = (SELECT C.SPR_NO FROM SPRINT C WHERE C.BLG_NO = #{blgNo} )

SELECT A.PA_ROLE , A.PJT_NO , A.MEM_NO , A.PA_NO , B.PJT_NO , B.PJT_NAME , B.PJT_START_DATE , B.PJT_DEL_YN , B.MEM_NO , B.PJT_END_DATE , B.PJT_COLOR , C.MEM_NAME FROM PJT_AUTHORITY A JOIN PROJECT B ON(A.PJT_NO = B.PJT_NO) JOIN MEMBER C ON(A.MEM_NO = C.MEM_NO) WHERE A.PJT_NO = #{pjtNo}
